items.sentence: I\'ve just renewed my passport, so it\'s good for another ten years.
You\'re the only one here who thinks Tom is a nice guy, aren\'t you?
No matter how busy I become, I\'ll always have time for my children.
If it doesn\'t rain tomorrow, Tom plans to go on a picnic with Mary.
If you need some money, why don\'t you borrow some from your mother?
How do you think climate change will affect our lives in the future?
I bought flowers because my grandmother is coming today for a visit.
I can think of some situations in which a knife would come in handy.
People can\'t stop talking about how nice a couple Tom and Mary are.
I\'m sure Tom would\'ve been unable to do that without Mary\'s help.
